players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Charlie.
Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Charlie's death is a tragedy, but it confirms there is a mafia among us. We must be careful not to vote randomly. I suggest we all share our thoughts."
Bob: "Alice is the mafia. I investigated her last night and confirmed it."
Diana: "Bob, if you're the detective, why did you investigate Alice instead of someone more suspicious? That seems like a waste of your first investigation."

You: "Bob, if you're truly the detective, why reveal your investigation so bluntly? That seems like a desperate mafia play to frame me. Diana makes a good point; investigating me first was a strange choice."

Bob: "Alice is the mafia. My investigation confirmed it. Diana, I investigated Alice because I had no prior information and she was a viable target. Revealing my findings immediately is the most efficient way to eliminate the mafia."
Diana: "Bob, if you're the detective, why not investigate someone more suspicious like Charlie? Your claim feels like a mafia framing Alice."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Diana voted for Bob
Bob was arrested
